welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stony Brook University in the charming town of Stony Brook, known for its rich history, picturesque scenery, and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft and offers a range of services for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport is used for private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
